      • sendGcmMessageToUser

        public void sendGcmMessageToUser(User receiver,
                        java.lang.String messageType,
                        Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>... messageData)
        Sends a gcm message to a specific user passing a certain message type and multiple messages with it
        Parameters:
        receiver - the user that should receive the messageu
        messageType - the type of the message (see GcmConstants)
        messageData - multiple instances Pair that contain several messages that should be sent with the gcm
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException if the connection to Google was not successful and msg could not be sent
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the receiver is not valid or not registered.
